thread.title: BRIEF-Shaw Communications Says Current CFO Vito Culmone Will Be Leaving Co

title: BRIEF-Shaw Communications Says Current CFO Vito Culmone Will Be Leaving Co

organizations.name: culmone will be leaving co reuters

text: February 15, 2018 / 1:58 PM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-Shaw Communications Says Current CFO Vito Culmone Will Be Leaving Co Reuters Staff Feb 15 (Reuters) - Shaw Communications Inc: * SHAW COMMUNICATIONS ANNOUNCES CFO TRANSITION AS PART OF TOTAL BUSINESS TRANSFORMATION * SHAW COMMUNICATIONS INC - CURRENT CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER VITO CULMONE WILL BE LEAVING ORGANIZATION * SHAW COMMUNICATIONS INC - TREVOR ENGLISH WILL BE ASSUMING ROLE OF EXECUTIVE VICE PRESIDENT, CHIEF FINANCIAL & CORPORATE DEVELOPMENT OFFICER Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
